text: Varsham Boranyan (; born on 4 March 1988) is an Armenian Greco-Roman wrestler who won the gold medal at 2016 European Wrestling Championships.Varsham Boranyan – Champion of the European ChampionshipGreco-roman wrestling - Varsham Boranyan (Armenia) - The-Sports.org ==References== == External links == * Varsham Boranyan is the new champion of Europe | Greko-Roman Wrestling * GOLD GR - 71 kg: V. BORANYAN (ARM) df. A. MAKSIMOVIC (SRB), 3-0 * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Armenian male sport wrestlers Category:European Wrestling Championships medalists
title: Varsham Boranyan
